Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.4 Sappaṭighaduka » 2.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.4.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.4.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaṭighaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
59.
675Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
676Anulomaṃ.
